title: What are the similarities of classical and neo-classical arts? - Quora

response.answer_text: Classical music is very structured. It almost always has the same general structure among the various works that are from the Classical period. I’m not that familiar with neo-classical arts. But from its name I would guess that it is a new (neo) form of art that expresses itself in a structured way, much like the Classical period, but in newer, more modern expressions. If something could be freer and more uninhibited yet still contained in a structure, I would guess that might be neo-classical art. That’s the best I can do.
